Reviews.Title: “Air condition worked as a jumping drill”
Reviews.Author: Egon5
Reviews.Content: Well, the mountain view was nice and the room was okay, but the air condition apart of cooling gave every 5 minutes a drilling noise, thus, sleeping was impossible. Is this the way to economize the rental? In addition, the lady at the reception was unable to let us an additional sheet. Egon (nickname)

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Bruc
HotelInfo.Address: Ctra Nacional II, 08294 Barcelona, Spain
